meanings.definition: To add too much salt to something.
meanings.sent1: She oversalts her food every time, making it too salty to eat.
meanings.sent2: He accidentally oversalts the soup, making it almost inedible.
meanings.sent3: The chef oversalts the dish, turning it into a salt lick instead of a meal.
meanings.sent4: The cook oversalts the stew, transforming it into a sea of saltiness.
meanings.sent5: The mistake of oversalting the pasta ruined the entire dinner.

meanings.sent1: They oversalts their fries, making them too salty to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: The recipe warns not to oversalts the sauce to avoid overpowering the flavors.
meanings.sent3: The kids oversalts their popcorn, creating a salty explosion in their mouths.
meanings.sent4: The chef oversalts the steak, masking the natural taste of the meat.
meanings.sent5: The cook always oversalts the salad, making it more like a salt lick than a healthy dish.
